fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport
eu_initiatives: Bilateral meetings with EU Parliamentarians and Members of the EU commission to raise awareness for the Paralympic Movement and Para-Sport.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Vision: To enable Para athletes to achieve sporting excellence and inspire and excite the world. 
 
Aspiration: To make for a more inclusive society for people with an impairment through Para sport.
